title: Khư̄ ʻitsarachon, khư̄ khon dī, khư̄ Sībūraphā
publishers: Samnakngān Khana ʻAnukammākān Fāi Prasānngān Khrōngkān 100 Pī Kulāp Sāipradit (Sībūraphā)

description.value: On the life and works of Kulap Saipradit or Siburapha, a Thai writer and journalist; collection of articles to commemorate his centennial anniversary.
